thread.title: Raptors all-star DeRozan back in lineup after missing thee games
thread.title_full: Raptors all-star DeRozan back in lineup after missing thee games

author: Steven Loung
title: Raptors all-star DeRozan back in lineup after missing thee games
text:
Raptors all-star DeRozan back in lineup after missing thee games 
DeMar DeRozan. (Alex Brandon/AP) Steven Loung January 29, 2017, 5:19 PM Steven Loung January 29, 2017, 5:19 PM 
Toronto Raptors all-star DeMar DeRozan is in the starting lineup for Sunday’s game against the Orlando Magic. DeMar DeRozan is active and starting today vs. Orlando. #WeTheNorth 
— RaptorsMR (@RaptorsMR) January 29, 2017 
DeRozan had been sidelined for the past three games with an ankle injury. 
Voted in as an all-star starter, DeRozan is enjoying a career year, averaging 27.9 points per game on 47.3 per cent shooting. 
The Raptors were 1-2 without the three-time all-star. More from Sportsnet
